test_cases.Title: PrizeDecryptionThreshold_001_Requirement_PaymentProcedure_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the online gaming portal as a registered user.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Participate in a Giochi Numerici a Totalizzatore Nazionale game (e.g., SuperEnalotto SuperStar) and simulate a win with a prize amount of exactly €10,500.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Winning notification is displayed with the prize amount of €10,500.00.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the prize withdrawal process for the €10,500.00 win.
Steps.Expected Result: System prompts for decryption of user personal data (anagrafiche) as part of the payment procedure.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User account is registered and verified.
2. User is eligible to participate in online Giochi Numerici a Totalizzatore Nazionale games.
3. System is configured with the updated decryption threshold of €10,500.00.
4. Test environment allows simulation of winning scenarios.
test_cases.Dataset: Registered user credentials; simulated win of €10,500.00.
test_cases.Expected Result: For an online win of exactly €10,500.00, the system requires decryption of user personal data before payment is processed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers exact threshold scenario for decryption requirement.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_001_PhysicalTicketAnyAmount_SuperEnalotto/NPL_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Prize Payment system via the desktop interface.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment system main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the option to process a prize payment for a physical ticket.
Steps.Expected Result: Physical ticket payment form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid ticket details for a physical ticket of any amount.
Steps.Expected Result: Ticket details are accepted and validated.

Steps.Step Description: Select the payment location as either Milano or Roma, or indicate postal/vettori submission.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment location is accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the payment request.
Steps.Expected Result: System processes the payment and confirms successful transaction.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Tester has access to the Prize Payment system on a desktop computer.
2. Valid physical ticket is available for testing.
3. Payment locations (Milano, Roma, postal/vettori) are configured in the system.
test_cases.Dataset: Physical ticket details (serial number, amount, etc.), payment location data.
test_cases.Expected Result: Physical ticket prize payment is processed successfully for any amount via Milano, Roma, or postal/vettori channels.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_002_OnlinePrizeAbove5200_SuperEnalotto/NPL_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Prize Payment system via the desktop interface.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment system main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the option to process a prize payment for an online play.
Steps.Expected Result: Online play payment form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid online play details for a prize with gross amount greater than €5,200.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Online play details are accepted and validated.

Steps.Step Description: Select the payment location as either Milano or Roma.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment location is accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Trigger the ADM commission verification and authorization process.
Steps.Expected Result: ADM commission verification and authorization is performed and result is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the payment request after successful ADM authorization.
Steps.Expected Result: System processes the payment and confirms successful transaction.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Tester has access to the Prize Payment system on a desktop computer.
2. Valid online play prize above €5,200.00 is available for testing.
3. ADM commission verification and authorization process is operational.
4. Payment locations (Milano, Roma) are configured in the system.
test_cases.Dataset: Online play details (user ID, prize amount > €5,200.00), ADM commission data, payment location data.
test_cases.Expected Result: Online prize payment above €5,200.00 is processed successfully at Milano or Roma after ADM commission authorization.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_003_OnlinePrizeAbove5200_NoADMApproval_SuperEnalotto/NPL_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Prize Payment system via the desktop interface.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment system main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the option to process a prize payment for an online play.
Steps.Expected Result: Online play payment form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid online play details for a prize with gross amount greater than €5,200.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Online play details are accepted and validated.

Steps.Step Description: Select the payment location as either Milano or Roma.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment location is accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to submit the payment request without ADM commission authorization.
Steps.Expected Result: System blocks the payment and displays an error indicating ADM commission authorization is required.

test_cases.Dataset: Online play details (user ID, prize amount > €5,200.00), payment location data.
test_cases.Expected Result: System prevents payment of online prizes above €5,200.00 at Milano or Roma without ADM commission authorization.

test_cases.Expected Result: Prize payment between €5,200.00 and €52,000.00 is processed successfully at PPP with ADM commission authorization for online prizes.

test_cases.Title: VerifyWinLimitUpdate_001_VerificaVincite_GNTN_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Enter a ticket with a winning amount of €10,500.00 and submit the check.
Steps.Expected Result: The system displays the winning amount and offers Prize Payment options.

test_cases.Title: BankTransferBooking_004_TerminaliGioco_GNTN_TEST_Terminale

Steps.Step Description: Access the Terminale di Gioco at a Punto Pagamenti Premi (PPP) as an authorized operator.
Steps.Expected Result: Operator is authenticated and the terminal main menu is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to book a bank transfer for a winning amount of €10,499.99.
Steps.Expected Result: Booking is not allowed; system displays an error or disables the option.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to book a bank transfer for a winning amount of €10,500.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Booking is allowed and proceeds to the next step.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to book a bank transfer for a winning amount of €52,000.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Booking is allowed and proceeds to the next step.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to book a bank transfer for a winning amount of €52,000.01.
Steps.Expected Result: Booking is not allowed; system displays an error or disables the option.

test_cases.Reference System: Terminale di Gioco PPP, GNTN System
test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Operator account is active and authorized.
2. Terminale di Gioco is operational and connected to the GNTN system.
3. Test winnings of €10,499.99, €10,500.00, €52,000.00, and €52,000.01 are available.

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the Sirio application with valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Gestione Premi' menu.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Gestione Premi' menu is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Richiesta di pagamento schedine' function.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment request interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to create a payment request for a GAD ticket with a gross winning amount of €0.00.
Steps.Expected Result: The system does not allow the creation of the payment request and displays an appropriate error or warning message.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials for Sirio.
2. At least one GAD ticket with a gross winning amount of €0.00 is available in the system.
test_cases.Functionality: Payment Request Blocking for GAD Tickets
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials; GAD ticket with gross winning amount of €0.00.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system must block the creation of payment requests for GAD tickets with a gross winning amount less than €10,500.00 and display an appropriate message.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers boundary scenario for zero amount.
test_cases._polarion: Sirio – Richiesta di pagamento schedine GAD

test_cases.Title: ReportGeneration_001_GlobaliInteriDaPagare_NPL_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the NPL application with valid credentials on a desktop device.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Liste e stampe' menu.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Liste e stampe' menu is displayed with available report options.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Globali interi da pagare' report from the list.
Steps.Expected Result: The report selection interface for 'Globali interi da pagare' is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a valid concorso (contest) from the available list.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected concorso is highlighted and ready for report generation.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the 'GAD' flag is checked/selected.
Steps.Expected Result: 'GAD' flag is visibly selected.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the button to generate or view the report.
Steps.Expected Result: The report is generated and displayed on screen.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials and access to NPL.
2. At least one concorso with winning tickets exists.
3. Desktop device with supported browser.
4. 'GAD' flag functionality is enabled.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user credentials; at least one concorso with winning tickets above and below €10,500.00.
test_cases.Expected Result: The report lists only winning tickets (schede vincenti) with gross amount greater than €10,500.00 for the selected concorso and all games, with 'GAD' flag selected.

test_cases.Title: Automatic_Payment_Threshold_Update_001_SIRIO_Documentation_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Sirio application as a user with permission to generate payment documents.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs into the Sirio application.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the process to generate a payment document related to prize payments.
Steps.Expected Result: System displays the payment document generation interface.

Steps.Step Description: Complete all required fields and generate the payment document.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment document is generated and displayed for review.

Steps.Step Description: Review the generated document for the presence of the automatic payment threshold value.
Steps.Expected Result: Document contains a field indicating the automatic payment threshold.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the threshold value is set to €10,500 and not €5,200.
Steps.Expected Result: Threshold value is correctly displayed as €10,500.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials with permissions to generate payment documents in Sirio.
2. Sirio application is accessible and operational.
3. Test environment contains up-to-date document templates.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials; sample prize payment data.
test_cases.Expected Result: All generated Sirio payment documents referencing the automatic payment threshold display €10,500 and do not reference €5,200.
test_cases._polarion: Indicazione soglia pagamento automatico su documentazione

test_cases.Title: Automatic_Payment_Threshold_Update_004_SIRIO_Documentation_Regression_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Sirio application and retrieve a historical payment document generated before the threshold update.
Steps.Expected Result: Historical document is retrieved and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the threshold value in the historical document.
Steps.Expected Result: Historical document may display €5,200 as the threshold value.

Steps.Step Description: Generate a new payment document using the current system.
Steps.Expected Result: New payment document is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the threshold value in the new document.
Steps.Expected Result: New document displays €10,500 as the threshold value.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Access to both historical and current Sirio document repositories.
2. User has valid credentials with permissions to view and generate payment documents.
3. Sirio application is accessible and operational.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials; access to historical and current payment documents.
test_cases.Expected Result: Only new Sirio documents display the updated threshold (€10,500); historical documents retain their original value (€5,200).
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Verifies regression and backward compatibility for documentation.
test_cases._polarion: Indicazione soglia pagamento automatico su documentazione

test_cases.Title: Check_Commission_Amount_Update_RU6_VerbaleDecrypt_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Obtain the latest version of the Verbale di Decrypt Word document managed by the Commission Team.
Steps.Expected Result: The latest Verbale di Decrypt Word document is available for review.

Steps.Step Description: Open the Word document and search for the string '5.200,00 euro'.
Steps.Expected Result: All occurrences of '5.200,00 euro' are highlighted or located in the document.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that each occurrence of '5.200,00 euro' has been replaced with '10.500,00 euro'.
Steps.Expected Result: No instance of '5.200,00 euro' remains; all are replaced with '10.500,00 euro'.

Steps.Step Description: Check the formatting and context of the updated amount to ensure it matches the original style and intent.
Steps.Expected Result: The updated amount '10.500,00 euro' is correctly formatted and contextually appropriate.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Access to the latest Verbale di Decrypt Word document.
2. Microsoft Word installed on the test computer.
3. Permissions to view and edit the document.
test_cases.Dataset: Latest Verbale di Decrypt Word document containing the old amount.
test_cases.Expected Result: All instances of '5.200,00 euro' in the Verbale di Decrypt Word document are replaced with '10.500,00 euro', with correct formatting and context.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the manual document update, not software logic.

test_cases.Title: Technical_Documentation_Availability_RU7_VerificaVincite_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the documentation portal or repository provided for online retailers.
Steps.Expected Result: Portal or repository is accessible without errors.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_001_VerificaVincite_AccessoAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is not logged in to the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is in a non-authenticated state.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the accredito (credit) banner is displayed on the digital receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is visible on the receipt.

Steps.Step Description: Click the accredito banner.
Steps.Expected Result: The registration flow managed by the retailer is triggered.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate the retailer not providing the registration step.
Steps.Expected Result: An informational modal appears with the message: 'Per procedere hai bisogno di un conto di gioco. Accedi al tuo profilo se hai già un conto di gioco, oppure registrati dall'applicazione e riprova.' and an OK button.

Steps.Step Description: Click the OK button on the modal.
Steps.Expected Result: The modal closes and the digital receipt is shown again.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1. GNTN product with WinBox enabled is available. 2. User is not logged in. 3. Winning ticket with amount ≤ €10,500 is generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket with WinBox enabled, amount ≤ €10,500, user not logged in.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a non-logged-in user with a winning ticket ≤ €10,500, the accredito banner is shown. If registration is not provided, the correct modal is displayed and closes as expected.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_002_VerificaVincite_AccessoAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is logged in to the application but has not activated the accredito service.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is in an authenticated state, accredito service not active.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the accredito banner is displayed on the digital receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is visible on the receipt.

Steps.Step Description: Click the accredito banner.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito or accredito reservation flow is triggered.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1. GNTN product with WinBox enabled is available. 2. User is logged in but accredito service is not active. 3. Winning ticket with amount ≤ €10,500 is generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket with WinBox enabled, amount ≤ €10,500, user logged in, accredito service not active.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a logged-in user with a winning ticket ≤ €10,500 and accredito service not active, the accredito banner is shown and clicking it triggers the accredito or reservation flow.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_003_VerificaVincite_LimiteSuperato_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount greater than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the accredito banner is not displayed on the digital receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is not visible.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the box dedicated to alternative collection methods is displayed instead.
Steps.Expected Result: The alternative collection box is visible.

Steps.Step Description: Click the call-to-action (CTA) in the alternative collection box.
Steps.Expected Result: User is redirected to https://www.giochinumerici.info/come-riscuotere.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1. GNTN product with WinBox enabled is available. 2. Winning ticket with amount > €10,500 is generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket with WinBox enabled, amount > €10,500.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a winning ticket > €10,500, the accredito banner is not shown. Instead, the alternative collection box is displayed and the CTA redirects to the correct URL.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_004_VerificaVincite_NoWinBox_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play without WinBox enabled and win any amount.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the accredito banner is not displayed on the digital receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is not visible.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1. GNTN product without WinBox enabled is available. 2. Winning ticket is generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket without WinBox enabled.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a winning ticket without WinBox enabled, the accredito banner is not shown on the digital receipt.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_005_VerificaVincite_BorderAmount_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win exactly €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is generated and displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is logged in to the application and accredito service is not active.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is in an authenticated state, accredito service not active.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the accredito banner is displayed on the digital receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is visible on the receipt.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1. GNTN product with WinBox enabled is available. 2. User is logged in, accredito service not active. 3. Winning ticket with amount = €10,500 is generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning ticket with WinBox enabled, amount = €10,500, user logged in, accredito service not active.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a winning ticket of exactly €10,500, the accredito banner is shown as per requirements.

test_cases.Title: Secure_Communication_Validation_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a data exchange between System A and System B using the standard communication protocol.
Steps.Expected Result: The communication channel is established successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor the data packets exchanged between the systems using a network sniffer tool.
Steps.Expected Result: All data packets are encrypted and no sensitive information is visible in plain text.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to intercept and modify a data packet in transit.
Steps.Expected Result: The receiving system detects the tampering and rejects the modified packet.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Both System A and System B are operational and connected to the same network.
2. Security policies for data communication are configured as per project requirements.
3. Network sniffer and packet modification tools are available for testing.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, sample data payloads for transmission.
test_cases.Expected Result: Data exchanged between systems is encrypted, tamper-proof, and compliant with security policies.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers encryption and tamper detection during inter-system communication.

test_cases.Title: Unencrypted_Transmission_Block_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Configure System A to attempt sending data to System B without encryption (simulate misconfiguration).
Steps.Expected Result: System A initiates an unencrypted communication attempt.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the response from System B.
Steps.Expected Result: System B rejects the unencrypted connection and logs a security event.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Both systems are operational and connected.
2. Security policies require encrypted communication.
3. System A is configured to send unencrypted data for this test.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, unencrypted data payload.
test_cases.Expected Result: Unencrypted communication attempts are blocked and logged as security events.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers enforcement of encryption policy.

test_cases.Title: Certificate_Validation_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a secure connection from System A to System B using a valid SSL/TLS certificate.
Steps.Expected Result: Connection is established successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a secure connection from System A to System B using an expired or invalid SSL/TLS certificate.
Steps.Expected Result: Connection is refused and an error is logged.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Both systems are operational and configured for SSL/TLS communication.
2. Valid and invalid certificates are available for testing.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid and invalid SSL/TLS certificates.
test_cases.Expected Result: Only connections with valid certificates are accepted; invalid certificates are rejected and logged.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers certificate validation in secure communication.

test_cases.Title: Sensitive_Data_Exposure_Prevention_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a data transfer containing sensitive information (e.g., user credentials) between System A and System B.
Steps.Expected Result: Data is transmitted over an encrypted channel.

Steps.Step Description: Capture network traffic during the transfer using a sniffer tool.
Steps.Expected Result: Sensitive information is not visible in plain text in the captured traffic.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Both systems are operational and configured for secure communication.
2. Network sniffer tool is available.
3. Test data containing sensitive information is prepared.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, sensitive data payloads.
test_cases.Expected Result: Sensitive data is never exposed in plain text during transmission.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers prevention of sensitive data exposure during inter-system communication.

test_cases.Title: Security_Event_Logging_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to establish a connection between System A and System B using an unsupported protocol or cipher suite.
Steps.Expected Result: Connection attempt fails.

Steps.Step Description: Check the security logs on both systems.
Steps.Expected Result: The failed connection attempt is logged with relevant details (timestamp, source, reason for failure).

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Both systems are operational and configured for secure communication.
2. Logging mechanisms are enabled.
3. Unsupported protocol/cipher suite is available for testing.
test_cases.Dataset: Unsupported protocol/cipher suite configuration.
test_cases.Expected Result: All failed or suspicious connection attempts are logged for audit and investigation purposes.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers logging of security events related to communication failures.

test_cases.Title: PrivacyCompliance_001_RU14_PrivacyRiskCompliance_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application as a standard user on a desktop device.
Steps.Expected Result: User is able to log in and access the application interface.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section where personal data is collected, displayed, or managed (e.g., user profile, registration form, data management area).
Steps.Expected Result: Personal data fields are displayed according to existing privacy policies.

Steps.Step Description: Review the privacy policy link or section within the application.
Steps.Expected Result: Privacy policy is accessible and reflects current data management practices.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to perform any data-related action (e.g., update, delete, export personal data).
Steps.Expected Result: Actions are executed according to existing privacy and data management rules, with no deviation from previously established processes.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. The application is deployed and accessible on a desktop device.
2. User account with standard permissions is available.
3. No recent changes to privacy or data management modules have been implemented.
test_cases.Dataset: Standard user credentials; sample personal data (e.g., name, email, address).
test_cases.Expected Result: The application manages personal data in compliance with existing privacy policies, with no unauthorized changes or deviations from established data management practices.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers verification that no changes have been introduced to privacy/data management as per RU14.

test_cases.Title: PrivacyCompliance_002_RU14_PrivacyRiskCompliance_TEST_Mobile

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application on an Android or iOS device and log in as a standard user.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and accesses the main interface.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the user profile or any section where personal data is handled.
Steps.Expected Result: Personal data is displayed and managed according to existing privacy policies.

Steps.Step Description: Access the privacy policy from the app menu or settings.
Steps.Expected Result: Privacy policy is available and matches the current data management approach.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to update or delete personal data within the app.
Steps.Expected Result: Data management actions are performed as per existing privacy rules, with no unexpected behavior.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Mobile application is installed and up-to-date.
2. User account with standard permissions is available.
3. No recent updates to privacy or data management modules.
test_cases.Dataset: Standard user credentials; sample personal data.
test_cases.Expected Result: Mobile application enforces privacy and data management as previously established, with no unauthorized changes.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates that privacy/data management remains unchanged on mobile platforms as per RU14.

test_cases.Title: PrivacyCompliance_003_RU14_PrivacyRiskCompliance_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Access the backend or admin interface with appropriate credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: Admin user is authenticated and can access backend functionalities.

Steps.Step Description: Review the configuration and logs related to privacy and data management modules.
Steps.Expected Result: No recent changes or updates are present in privacy or data management configurations.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that data access, modification, and deletion operations are logged and comply with existing privacy policies.
Steps.Expected Result: All operations are logged and handled according to established privacy rules.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Backend/admin access is available.
2. No recent deployments or changes to privacy/data management modules.
3. Access to system logs and configuration files.
test_cases.Dataset: Admin credentials; access to configuration and log files.
test_cases.Expected Result: Backend system maintains privacy and data management as previously established, with no unauthorized changes or deviations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Ensures backend privacy/data management compliance as per RU14.

test_cases.Title: AcceptanceChecklist_001_RequirementAcceptance_Checklist_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the project documentation containing the requirements checklist.
Steps.Expected Result: Project documentation is accessible and contains the requirements checklist.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the internal verification process with the Business Unit Lottery.
Steps.Expected Result: Business Unit Lottery receives the checklist and acknowledges the start of the verification process.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the internal verification process with the Team Concession Compliance.
Steps.Expected Result: Team Concession Compliance receives the checklist and acknowledges the start of the verification process.

Steps.Step Description: Obtain formal approval from the Business Unit Lottery for all checklist items.
Steps.Expected Result: Business Unit Lottery formally approves all checklist items.

Steps.Step Description: Obtain formal approval from the Team Concession Compliance for all checklist items.
Steps.Expected Result: Team Concession Compliance formally approves all checklist items.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that both approvals are documented and stored in the project repository.
Steps.Expected Result: Both approvals are present and properly documented in the project repository.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Project requirements checklist is finalized and available.
2. Both Business Unit Lottery and Team Concession Compliance are identified and available for review.
3. Project repository is accessible for documentation.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample requirements checklist, access credentials for project repository, contact details for both teams.
test_cases.Expected Result: The project is considered accepted only if both the Business Unit Lottery and Team Concession Compliance have formally approved all items in the requirements checklist, and the approvals are documented in the project repository.
